Oil India Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in interview for 03 Engineer Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 29, 2025, 15:38 IST
 Oil India Limited
 3 Jobs |  Posted On : 29-Aug-2025 |  Assam |  Salary : 70,000 to 80,000




FOLLOW

Oil India Limited (Oil India) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 03 Engineer Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Mechanical Engineering can apply for the Oil India Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Assam.

Oil India Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Engineer	03	B.E./B. Tech in Mechanical Engineering.

Oil India Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 25 Years.
The maximum age limit: 45 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

Oil India Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

Oil India Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

Oil India Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 70,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 80,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the Oil India Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the Oil India Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee(if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Carry all the documents to the interview.
Attend the interview at the mentioned address.

Address:

OIL Human Resources Office, 5th Floor, Oil India Limited, Duliajan, Assam.

Important Dates:

Starting date	29-08-2025
Closing date	15-09-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
